content: The "Location" fields at http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/rendering.html#text-appearance which talk about these two extensions do not mention their application to item.answerOption.valueString or valueCoding.display. I suppose I could work around this by making an contained ValueSet, but is there a reason not to include those?
Not that I can think of. Change request? :)
